ygData.subject: Re: Re: SK Items
ygData.msgSnippet: ... What about a lifetap effect?  Or maybe some DD/DOT effect? On a side note, if the engine permits it, an aura of darkness would be the coolest thing in the
ygData.messageBody:
Tom wrote:
>
> From: Tom <bearsfootball@...>
>
> Yes great idea on the sword/shield anit ghoulbane
> combo. I agree that us higher level sks need to still
> be able to attain the sword and shield though. Shock
> of Poison would be a great effect for dd but i think
> that would be WAY WAY WAY too unbalanced.
>

What about a lifetap effect? Or maybe some DD/DOT effect?
On a side note, if the engine permits it, an aura of darkness
would be the coolest thing in the game, I'm envious of the cool
visuals on Soulfire, but an aura of darkness would be even cooler.

I'd also like to see this quest be fairly involved, which would be
hard to do for both Humans and DEs. And to the SKs out there,
please don't post a walkthrough like what happened with Soulfire.
That's just lame.

Xilith
